articles.description: Scientists have divided all cancers into two groups, based on the presence or absence of a specific protein known as the Yes-associated protein, or "YAP".
articles.content: All cancers fall into just two categories, according to new research from scientists at Sinai Health, in findings that could provide a new strategy for treating the most aggressive and untreatable fo… [+2795 chars]
